Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1333.jpg'}
{3: 'The fight over, you both make your way back to where the vehicle was parked, only to be greeted by a scene of utter violation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "This... this isn't possible. My sensors didn't pick up any Hetero-Creature movement in this direction...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You retrieve the monitoring equipment you had stashed under the seat and begin sifting through the logs.'}
{2: 'And the Punishing Virus readings have been stable.', 3: '12'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Could it be a new type of Hetero-Creature? Or...', 4: '1'}
{3: "You circle to the vehicle's rear, your eyes tracing the lines of damage."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The damage is extensive... It looks like the random destruction of a Hetero-Creature or a wild animal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But the most concentrated damage is around the power engine.', 3: '20'}
{3: 'A web of crisscrossing scratches covers the vehicle, but the deepest gashes converge at the power unit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, you mean...?', 4: '1'}
{2: "...It's still too early to draw conclusions.", 3: '27'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory394.jpg'}
{3: 'As you speak, the sun dips behind the mountains, and leaden shadows bleed out from the peaks, swallowing the light.'}
{2: "Let's head back to the conservation area for now.", 3: '31'}
{3: 'On these unfamiliar roads, pushing ahead feels like the wrong move.'}
{3: 'Most mountains of the mining area stand stark and treeless, their towering shadows stretching in twisted shapes across the land.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{3: 'Liv acknowledges and moves toward you, but for a split second, the shifting light glints strangely in her visual module, making the world around her seem filtered and unreal.'}
{3: 'Your face softens into a hazy smudge.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: "Hmm? What's up?", 3: '53', 4: "I'm right here. What's wrong?", 5: '53'}
{3: "Your familiar voice instantly settles Liv's nerves."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...It's nothing. Just a minor glitch in my visual module. It's calibrated now.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Your visual module?', 3: '58'}
{3: 'The familiar abnormal fluctuation immediately reminds you of the unexpected situation during your recent battle.'}
{2: 'Your M.I.N.D. experienced slight fluctuations during that last battle, too...', 3: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's probably just some desynchronization. My new frame is still in its break-in period.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Are you sure you're okay now?", 3: '64'}
{2: "If you notice anything abnormal, promise me you'll tell me right away.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I will. I promise, Commandant. Don't worry.", 4: '1'}
